data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The First Quarter Ended 30.06.2021
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that a meeting of Board of Directors of the Company was held on 9th August, 2021, interalia, to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results for the First Quarter ended 30th June, 2021 and the text of the advertisement to be published in newspapers.

We enclose herewith scanned copies of the Statement of Unaudited Financial Results for the First Quarter ended 30th June, 2021 and Limited Review Report given by M/s. Khanna & Panchmia, Auditors of the Company on the said results.

The Board meeting concluded at 1.30 p.m.
